mapper.select: SELECT m.id, IF(m.sender_id = #{userId}, m.receiver_id, m.sender_id) AS userId, u.username, u.avatar, m.content AS lastContent, m.create_time AS lastTime FROM message m LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = IF(m.sender_id = #{userId}, m.receiver_id, m.sender_id) WHERE (m.sender_id = #{userId} OR m.receiver_id = #{userId}) AND m.type = 'PRIVATE' AND m.id IN ( SELECT MAX(id) FROM message WHERE (sender_id = #{userId} OR receiver_id = #{userId}) AND type = 1 GROUP BY IF(sender_id = #{userId}, receiver_id, sender_id) ) ORDER BY m.create_time DESC

SELECT u.id AS senderId, u.username AS senderName, u.avatar AS senderAvatar, a.id AS articleId, a.title AS articleTitle, m.create_time AS createTime FROM message m JOIN user u ON m.sender_id = u.id JOIN article a ON INSTR(m.content, a.title) > 0 WHERE m.receiver_id = #{userId} AND m.type = 'LIKE' ORDER BY m.create_time DESC

SELECT u.id AS senderId, u.username AS senderName, u.avatar AS senderAvatar, m.create_time AS createTime FROM message m JOIN user u ON m.sender_id = u.id WHERE m.receiver_id = #{userId} AND m.type = 4 ORDER BY m.create_time DESC

SELECT u.id AS senderId, u.username AS senderName, u.avatar AS senderAvatar, m.content AS commentContent , a.title AS articleTitle, -- 从 article 表获取文章标题 a.id AS articleId, m.create_time AS createTime FROM message m LEFT JOIN user u ON m.sender_id = u.id -- 连接 user 表，获取发送者信息 LEFT JOIN article a ON INSTR(m.content, a.title) > 0 -- 假设 comment_content 中包含文章ID或文章标题 WHERE m.receiver_id = #{userId} -- 查询接收者ID AND m.type = 'COMMENT' -- 只查询评论类型的消息 ORDER BY m.create_time DESC; -- 按时间降序排列
